reviewText:
Since I like all kinds of movies, I thought I would pick this up, on the cheap, since cable television used to show these all the time. I was a little disappointed by the DVD print that came my way with these three films, as they are somewhat blurry on all three of the films. I don't think I would by a multi-package of films again, due to the blur factor.

Unless you've lived under a rock for the last 20 years, you already know what you are going to get with Jean-Claude, which is not such a bad thing. Cyborg I would probably only watch once, Double Impact & Death Warrant many, many, more times.

Van Dammagisty, indeed.

I love TGG Direct sets. I have the Leviathan, Burnt Offerings and Lifeforce horror triple feature from this same company. I grew up on Van Damme movies and when I saw this I had to get it. These are three really great Van Damme movies and Double Impact is usually considered his best film. All films are 1:85.1 anamorphic widescreen. The picture on all of these is great quality. The movies themselves are great. I love all three of these. I haven't seen any of these in over 15 years so it was a great refresher seeing them again. Collecting all of Van Dammes best movies on DVD is real affordable these days and this is a great place to start. Lots of action and well worth the price.

While the plot, like most action movies, suffers a bit, this movie is still a lot of fun to watch.  You get not only Jean Claude's martial arts prowess on display, there are others.  The most prominent being Cory Everson who is so sexy as a bad girl it hurts.  In fact one of the weaknesses of this movie is the fact that she is not on screen more often.  Check out her search of Jean Claude's girlfriend.  it's a real turn on.

jean-claude van damme is the best, and with this collection you'll know what i mean. with movies like these you'll love to buy more of his movies and u might even turn out a van damme fan....like me. jean-claude van damme  is the best and always will be. Don't miss out on your chance to have your  own JEAN-CLAUDE VAN DAMME COLLECTION
Thank you!

Collectors 3-pack of hey-day films from one of the most well known & charismatic action movie stars of our time. Very good 1080p transfer, vivid color & sharpness with robust 5.1 home theater sound. JCVD & his twin's performance in Double Impact takes the crown for me among these three!
Good movies fast shipping

Cyborg goes to prove even with a low budget you can make a very good movie.  Actually well written and one of JCVD  most unrated action movies. Top 5 in my book of JCDV movies.  Time Cop is number 1

Double Impact was made when JCVD was so popular he could clone myself in a movie and cause double the Van Dammeage  During this movie you can see the bodybuilding influence his wife female bodybuilder Gladys Portugues was having on him as he takes every opportunity not to wear a shirt.

Death Warrant Not bad for action... so-so for plot and poor Robert Guillaume's over acting make this the lightest of the 3 movies in this set. But still plenty of kicks,

NOT WIDESCREEN as indicated!  I love movies and truly belief that full screen does not give the same experience. In Double Impact the subtitles were running off the bottom edge of my screen.  Great movies, poor salesmanship via product description.

Thank you so much! This collection of kick-butt-awesome 'Van Damme" style arrived quick as a roundhouse to my face! appreciate the promptness and quality of dvd is just fine. Price was reasonable too! Great buy!

I got this DVD mainly because it had Double Impact which is one of my favorite Van Damme movies.  Cyborg and Death Warrant aren't bad either and definitely make for great entertainment.  Even still, this was a great purchase.  It's not very often you can get three good Van Damme films for the price of one!
If you like van damme movies, these are the classics you want...they look great! Restored perfectly. Own them! I do!
I grew up watching him, and I'm a big fan of Jean- Claude No complain about his movie because he's a great actor! Indeed, I highly recommend this seller because that individual deserved it.

I've always been a martial arts movie fan and I enjoy most of Van Damme's action movies. I own a good collection of them. This set includes 3 movies; 3 DVDs. I bought this set since I wanted to get Double Impact, one of Jean Claude Van Damme's most memorable roles of his career. After watching all 3 movies, I think Death Warrant is the best of the three. Explosive Van Damme kick boxing martial arts. Some of his most explosive roles are in this collection that's for sure. All 3 movies are in the widescreen format 1.85:1. Cyborg can be watched in full screen as well. Cyborg and Death Warrant are in English or French. Double Impact can only be watched in English. Subtitles are in French and Spanish for all movies. Cyborg includes English subtitles as well. Good collection for Van Damme's fans.
